Package directory

Class UserDirectory

java.lang.Object
directory.UserDirectory
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDirectoryInterface
public class UserDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDirectoryInterface
A user directory holds information on all users that are a part of the directory

  • Method Details

    • login

      public Employee login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Method to login a user when provided the email and password
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserDirectoryInterface
      Parameters:
      email - email of an existing user that belong in the user directory
      password - password of an existing user that belongs in the user directory
      Returns:
      upon login: the employee/manager object, invalid credentials will return null value

    • logout

      public void logout​(Employee user)
      Method to logout a user given the user object
      Specified by:
      logout in interface UserDirectoryInterface
      Parameters:
      user - object of the user (employee/manager) that should be logged out

    • profileById

      public Profile profileById​(java.lang.String employeeId)
      Method to get the profile of a user given the user ID
      Specified by:
      profileById in interface UserDirectoryInterface
      Parameters:
      employeeId - id of the employee/manager that you wish to get the profile of
      Returns:
      if found existing ID: the profile of the user, non-found: return null

    • updateUserBio

      public boolean updateUserBio​(Employee author, Employee target, java.lang.String newBio)
      Update the Profile biography of a user as a manager
      Specified by:
      updateUserBio in interface UserDirectoryInterface
      Parameters:
      author - authorised author, required to be a instance of manager
      target - the user who will have the new biography
      newBio - new biography that will be applied to the Profile of the user
      Returns:
      true: successfully updated, false: invalid permission (author not authorised)

      Get the number of users contains in the user directory

      Returns:
      value of users in the user directory
